snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes the scheduled appearance of a movie about Steve Jobs at the 2013 Sundance FilmFestival, one of the strangest...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes the scheduled appearance of a movie about Steve Jobs at the 2013 Sundance FilmFestival, one of the strangest videos to appear on YouTube and a festival for GIFs.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: 'Homeland' Smartphones, and Amazon's Contest
